package_ids.description: This will export package events for the package IDs you've indicated. Providing `all` will include all packages, `none` will exclude all packages, or leaving this field out will **include** all packages.

tracking_pixel_ids.description: This will export tracking pixel events for the tracking pixel IDs you've indicated. Providing `all` will include all tracking pixels, `none` will exclude all tracking pixels, or leaving this field out will **include** all tracking pixels.

company_domains.description: This will export company events for company domains you've indicated.

include_company_rollups.description: Indicating `true` in this field will schedule an export of the company rolled up data. For more information, visit https://docs.scarf.sh/data-export/#how-to-export-company-data

variables.description: Variables for retrieving counts on variable values. These are presented in one column as values of key.value=count, with key.other for results not in the top. This only supports a small number of variables.
